record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Grassley, I ask unanimous consent that Anne Freeman and Lynda Simmons of the Finance Committee staff be given privileges of the floor from March 19 through March 25.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that during consideration of the budget resolution and any votes thereon that Susan Reeves, a congressional fellow with the Budget Committee, and Seema Mittal, a Budget Committee intern, be granted floor privileges.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
